choices.description: "no" options for work from office decision
choices.name: ch_maybe

choices.description: "no" options for work from office decision
choices.name: ch_no

choices.description: "yes" option for work from office decision
choices.name: ch_yes

decisions.description: Employee will be exiting on reluctance. On acceptance, verify health information and seek consent.
decisions.name: CHECK_EmployeeWillingnessToWorkFromOffice
decisions.label: Employee Willing To Work From Office

decisions.description: User's acceptance of the terms and conditions. Seek health verification on acceptance. On declining, seek reason and exit the process.
decisions.name: CHECK_TermsConditions
decisions.label: Terms and Conditions

Flow.description: Sample flow for verifying COVID-19 health status

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Types of health verifications that can be completed by a user.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: pch_healthVerificationType

Flow.label: [Sample] Health Verification

recordUpdates.description: Complete task on employee conveying reluctance to return to office.
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_TaskToCompleted_1
recordUpdates.label: Complete Task On Employee Reluctance

recordUpdates.description: Complete the task on employee's successful health verification and consent.
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_TaskToCompleted_2
recordUpdates.label: Complete Task

recordUpdates.description: Complete the task on employee's successful health verification and consent.
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_TaskToCompleted_3
recordUpdates.label: Complete Task

fields.name: S01_DT02
fields.fieldText: It looks like you need permission to start the Health Verification flow. Ask your admin or HR contact for help.﻿

screens.description: Capture employees willingness to return to office.
screens.name: S02_WorkFromOfficeDecision
screens.label: Work From Office Decision

fields.name: S02_RB01
fields.fieldText: Do you plan to work in one of our offices sometime soon?

screens.description: Thank the user for participating, complete task and exit.
screens.name: S03_ExitMessageForReluctantUser
screens.label: Exit Message For Reluctant User

fields.name: S03_DT02
fields.fieldText: OK. If you change your mind, contact human resources.

screens.description: Get user's acceptance on terms and conditions
screens.name: S04_AcceptTermsAndConditions
screens.label: Accept Terms and Conditions

fields.name: S04_DT02
fields.fieldText:
Terms and conditions and Privacy Notice:


Replace this text with your company’s terms and conditions and privacy notice/policy.


Note - If you are unable to use this form to have your COVID status verified please contact your HR department for assistance.


I have: (1) read and understand the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Notice; and (2) acknowledge and consent to the processing of my personal data for purposes of verifying my COVID-19 health status pursuant thereto.

fields.name: S04_RB01
fields.fieldText: Do you accept the terms and conditions of the health verification form?

screens.description: Capture health verification information from the user.
screens.name: S05_GetHealthVerificationInformation
screens.label: Seek Health Verification Information

fields.name: S05_DT02
fields.fieldText: Complete the health verification form.

fields.name: S05_DT03
fields.fieldText:
Upload a file to provide proof of your COVID health verification (e.g., a vaccination card, test result report, or documentation of recovery).

  • Valid File extensions accepted: .jpeg, .jpg, .png, .pdf

screens.description: Thank the user for participating, providing verification and consent.
screens.name: S06_EmployeeSuccessfulVerification
screens.label: Employee Successful Verification

fields.name: S06_DT02
fields.fieldText: Success! Thanks for submitting your COVID health verification information.

screens.description: Capture health verification information from the user.
screens.name: S07_HealthVerificationError
screens.label: Health Verification Error

screens.description: Get the reason why user chose to decline terms and conditions.
screens.name: S08_CaptureDeclinedHealthVerificationInformation
screens.label: Capture Declined Health Verification Information

fields.name: S08_DT02
fields.fieldText: Indicate your reason for being unable to provide COVID health verification documentation.

screens.description: On declining Terms and conditions, thank the user and exit the process.
screens.name: S09_DeclineConfirmationMessage
screens.label: Decline Confirmation Message

fields.name: S09_DT02
fields.fieldText: Thank you for submitting your COVID health verification response.

textTemplates.name: caseDescription
textTemplates.text: A new health verification has been submitted by one of our employees that requires review for approval so they can return to the workplace safely.
